[Environmental Engineering : Quality Parameters of Water]

3

 ).  It is
estimated that, during coagulation of this water, 450 kg/day of calcium bicarbonate

The quantity of pure quick lime,

to 2 decimal places). 
Ans. 99 to 100 OR 154 to 156
